question: As per the provisions of the Article 94 of the Constitution of India, whenever the Lok Sabha is dissolved, the office of the Speaker becomes vacant at which among the following time?
option1: Immediately after Lok Sabha is dissolved
option2: Immediately after the New Government is elected
option3: Immediately after election for new Lok Sabha is completed
option4: Immediately before the first session of the next Lok Sabha
answer: Immediately before the first session of the next Lok Sabha
